msbt.message: Hey! You see that? C.J.'s over in the plaza gettin' ready. You know what that means It's just about time for the Fishin' Tourney to start!By the look on your face, I'd say you're itchin' to start fishin'! Gahaha! Me too, !
Looks like the Fishin' Tourney is starting real soon! It's gonna be a doozy!I plan to catch an entire school of fish and maybe earn a prize or five. You in, ?
The Fishin' Tourney starts at 9 AM! But I suppose you already knew that.Busy day ahead, kiddo. Lots of excitement. Be sure to get your noggin' in the game, !
You're in the Fishin' Tourney too?<10_4 /> Well then, I better put on my big-boy waders!Gahaha! How about we both just catch as many as we can. You and me against the fish, !
Well, if it ain't ! Looks like this Fishin' Tourney is gonna be a good one! I don't want you to think I only care about winnin'but with you in the mix, I'm pullin' out all my best lures.
Today's an all-you-can-fish extravaganza bonanza!But you better stay focused, kiddo, or I might fish all the fish right out from under you! Gahaha! Just joshin' with you!
You wouldn't believe all the fish I caught today! What a haul! Wish you could have seen how I handled this ol' fishin' rod. Bet it was an impressive sight!
Well, another Fishin' Tourney has wrapped up.This place sure was lively for a while there. All that hubub I miss it already.
How'd you do in today's Fishin' Tourney?I was in top form, myself. Won a prize too! I think I was in what you'd call a "groove."

So, you want me to tell you a good place to fish, eh? Sorry kiddo, that's top secret info! Gahaha! I'm kiddin'!<10_4 /> Thing is, there's not much to tell. You see a fish, you toss in your line. It's that easy.
How's the fishin'?<10_4 /> A little advice What really matters is how many fish you catch. So, all you gotta do iskeep castin' that lure till your arms feel like they're gonna fall off! Gahaha!
When it comes to fishing, it's a numbers game. If even a few get away, it can ruin a good run! That's why I make sure to catch every fish I aim for, !
There's nothing better than gettin' everyone together to enjoy some fishin' in the sunshine. Gah! Enough with the daydreamin'! It's time I buckle down and catch those fish, !
Hey, I bet you can't go the entire Fishing Tourney only catchin' the big fish, .Truth be told, I bet you can. You're so good at fishing, I just thought I'd throw ya a challenge! Gahaha!
Keep waitin' for a bit or hop off to find a better spot. That there's the eternal fishin' conundrum! Gahaha!
You seem awfully relaxed. You do know there's a Fishing Tourney happenin', right?I don't know how you stay so cool. This tourney's got me more jittery than butter in a skillet, .
When you cast your line, do you look which way the water's flowin'? What about where the fish is facing?Seems like I'm always forgettin' one or the other. Maybe I'm just not cut out for this, .
You gotta be a serious fishin' fan to be out here in this kind of cold.Though I suppose if you just close your eyes and think warm thoughts, then<10_4 /> Nope, still cold, !
It's like everything is finally startin' to wake up from the cold months, fish included!Me, I'm doin' the opposite. The breeze has got me feelin'a mite sleepy
This morning I woke up feelin' invigorated and ready to fish up a storm, !At least, that is until the heat hit me. Now I feel like I oughta be joinin' the fish instead of catching 'em.
Careful runnin' up to fish. You don't wanna scare 'em. Same goes for me. I scare easily, .
This morning I woke up feelin' invigorated and ready to fish up a storm, !At least, that is until the heat hit me. Now I feel like I oughta be joinin' the fish instead of catching 'em.
Careful runnin' up to fish. You don't wanna scare 'em. Same goes for me. I scare easily, .
You gotta be a serious fishin' fan to be out here in this kind of cold.Though I suppose if you just close your eyes and think warm thoughts, then<10_4 /> Nope, still cold, !
It's like everything is finally startin' to wake up from the cold months, fish included!Me, I'm doin' the opposite. The breeze has got me feelin'a mite sleepy
